column2: b'So if you like Spring Valley Acq (sustainability, yeah!); a share $SV costs $10.45. A warrant $SVSVW costs $1.75. A unit $SVSVU (a share and half a warrant) costs $10.75. Tight spreads and liquid, not an isolated thing. #YouDoTheMath #SPACArb'
b'A Form 10-Q [Quarterly Report] filing has been made with the SEC:  $SV $SVSVU $SVSVW SPRING VALLEY ACQUISITION CORP  https://t.co/l4MTp4Be6P'
